name: Chess

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline';child-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline' ; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'

description: Chess game in browser offline and online for 1-2 players
